original_text: They tried to give Jesus some wine to drink. They had mixed some medicine called myrrh into the wine. But Jesus would not drink it.
korean_text: 몰약을 탄 포도주를 주었으나 예수께서 받지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: They tried to give Jesus some wine to drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수에게 마실 포도주를 주려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They had mixed some medicine called myrrh
But Jesus would not drink it
